subject: Soccer
Jews and Judaism
lead_paragraph: For years there has been a perception that Tottenham Hotspur of the Premier League is a so-called Jewish club in London. But the true Jewish team plays a lower league in Barnet.
snippet: For years there has been a perception that Tottenham Hotspur of the Premier League is a so-called Jewish club in London. But the true Jewish team plays a lower league in Barnet.
